cm.model
Class CheckableItem

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.CheckableItem

public class CheckableItem
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a checkable item. Used in EffectWin and RechargeWin.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>
